backend/main.mo: Motoko canister managing user profiles and ML health predictions with access control checks and stored maps per principal.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature IDs to affected frontend files, components, and test references.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing roles of various frontend components, pages, hooks, and styling files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global stylesheet defining OKLCH theme variables for light and dark modes and applying base colors.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React app setting up routing, providers, theme, Internet Identity, and Design B layout.
frontend/src/auth/demoCredentialStore.ts: LocalStorage-backed demo account system with simple hashing, account creation, lookup, and credential verification.
frontend/src/auth/demoCredentialTypes.ts: Type definitions for demo accounts and result types used during authentication flows.
frontend/src/auth/session.ts: Local session management utility handling storage, validation, expiration, and clearing of demo auth sessions.
frontend/src/components/assistant/assist: Deterministic command interpreter handling navigation, medical queries, emergencies, and unsupported Flutter requests.
frontend/src/components/assistant/Assist: UI panel rendering transcript, status, speech input/output, and message controls, integrating speech recognition and TTS behaviors.
frontend/src/components/assistant/assist: LocalStorage utilities for loading, saving, and clearing persisted assistant transcripts.
Type definitions for assistant messages, status, state, and command interpretation results.
frontend/src/components/assistant/Assist: Floating assistant widget managing panel state, routing commands, transcript updates, and voice/text input handling.
frontend/src/components/assistant/medica: Curated medical topics with keywords, clarifying questions, responses, red flags, and standard disclaimers.
frontend/src/components/assistant/useAss: React hook managing transcript state with persistence and helpers for adding and clearing messages.
frontend/src/components/assistant/useSpe: React hook wrapping browser SpeechRecognition with transcript, interim results, errors, and start/stop control.
React hook handling speech synthesis enablement, speaking, cancellation, and state tracking.
frontend/src/components/assistant/useTra: Hook managing scroll position for transcripts, auto-scrolling when near bottom and exposing refs and scroll controls.
frontend/src/designB/components/Dashboar: Header component rendering a title, optional caption, and optional action slot.
Configurable tile component with icon, label, value, and interactive or static variants.
frontend/src/designB/components/DesignBS: Surface wrapper applying themed background, shadow, or border based on variant.
frontend/src/designB/components/DesignBT: Set of typography components for titles, captions, and body text.
frontend/src/designB/components/ThemeSwi: Toggle switch for switching between default and Design B themes.
frontend/src/designB/data/placeholders.t: Provides a mock user profile generated with a fixed seed.
frontend/src/designB/layout/DesignBAppSh: Main app shell with header, footer, bottom tabs, and assistant widget, adapting UI based on route and auth state.
frontend/src/designB/layout/DesignBBotto: Bottom navigation bar with Home and Profile tabs, highlighting the active route.
frontend/src/designB/storage/themePrefer: Utilities for saving and loading theme preference to localStorage.
frontend/src/designB/theme.ts: Defines Design B theme tokens and functions to apply or remove the theme attribute.
frontend/src/designB/themeContext.tsx: Context provider managing current theme, persistence, and helper hook for accessing theme state.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, recreating and invalidating queries on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuthSession.ts: Hook for managing local authentication sessions including OTP, password, and guest modes.
frontend/src/hooks/useDemoOtp.ts: Hook implementing demo OTP generation, verification, cooldown tracking, and session resets.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication including login, logout, initialization, and identity restoration.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines example React Query hooks and a user profile fetcher that depends on an authenticated actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useRedirectIfAuthenti: Redirects users to /home if they already have a valid Internet Identity or local session.
frontend/src/hooks/useRequireAuth.ts: Route guard that redirects unauthenticated users to /signin based on Internet Identity and local session state.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserDisplayName.ts: Resolves a user's display name using profile data, local session, or Internet Identity principal in priority order.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS setup defining themes, color variables, and design overrides.
frontend/src/lib/flaker.ts: Deterministic fake data generator producing user-like profiles using a seeded PRNG.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Provides a utility function to merge class names using clsx and tailwind-merge.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point setting up React Query and Internet Identity provider before rendering the app.
frontend/src/pages/AppointmentDetails.ts: Empty page placeholder for appointment details.
frontend/src/pages/Chatbot.tsx: Authenticated chatbot page handling assistant messages, command interpretation, and navigation responses.
frontend/src/pages/DoctorList.tsx: Empty page placeholder for doctor list.
frontend/src/pages/HomeDashboard.tsx: Renders the authenticated user's health dashboard with today's metrics and quick action tiles. Includes navigation and various styled metric components.
frontend/src/pages/Profile.tsx: Displays and edits user profile details with a modal form, validation, and save handling. Supports sign‑out and loading states.
frontend/src/pages/SignIn.tsx: Implements phone-based OTP, password, and Internet Identity sign‑in flows with validation and redirects. Manages multi-step state and profile initialization.
frontend/src/pages/SignUp.tsx: Handles account creation with basic validation, local profile initialization, and redirect to the home dashboard. Supports full name, phone, and password inputs.
frontend/src/pages/Welcome.tsx: Landing page introducing the app with hero content and options to sign in or continue as guest. Redirects authenticated users automatically.
frontend/src/profile/profileBackendMappe: Provides mapping functions between backend UserProfile structures and frontend ProfileDetails. Includes blood type conversions and date bigint ↔ string helpers.
frontend/src/profile/profileLocalStore.t: Manages saving, loading, and clearing profile data in localStorage keyed by session type, with support for merging auth-provided data into existing profiles.
frontend/src/profile/profileTypes.ts: Defines the ProfileDetails interface and helpers for creating empty profiles and detecting if a profile contains any data.
frontend/src/profile/profileValidation.t: Validates profile fields including name, email, phone, and emergency contact, returning a list of human-readable errors.
frontend/src/profile/useProfileDetails.t: React hook that loads and saves profile data via backend or localStorage, using React Query for caching and mutations.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters, supporting both query strings and hash-based routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, fonts, shadows, animations, and container settings for the app.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing state, issues, and feature requirements focused on fixing chat scrolling behavior.
